svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

c4Type="SystemScopeBoundary" c4Application="Software System" label="<font style="font-size: 16px"><b><div style="text-align: left">%c4Name%</div></b></font><div style="text-align: left">[%c4Application%]</div>" id="4"> <mxCell style="rounded=1;fontSize=11;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;dashed=1;arcSize=20;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#666666;fontColor=#333333;labelBackgroundColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=bottom;labelBorderColor=none;spacingTop=0;spacing=10;dashPattern=8 c4Description="Authorizez the person/system based on Oauth2 protocol based on /authorize, /token, /revoke, /register-client, /introspect" label="<font style="font-size: 16px"><b>%c4Name%</b></font><div>[%c4Type%]</div><br><div><font style="font-size: 11px"><font color="#cccccc">%c4Description%</font></div>" id="5"> <mxCell style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=#1061B0;fontColor=#ffffff;align=center;arcSize=10;strokeColor=#0D5091;metaEdit=1;resizable=0;points=[[0.25,0,0],[0.5,0,0],[0.75,0,0],[1,0.25,0],[1,0.5,0],[1,0.75,0],[0.75,1,0],[0.5,1,0],[0.25,1,0],[0,0.75,0],[0,0.5,0],[0,0.25,0]];" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;fontSize=10;fontColor=#404040;strokeWidth=1;endFill=1;strokeColor=#828282;elbow=vertical;metaEdit=1;endSize=14;startSize=14;jumpStyle=arc;jumpSize=16;rounded=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;entryX=0.25;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </object> <mxCell id="7" value="Web client authorizes the person" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" parent="6" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-0.1353" y="-1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <object placeholders="1" c4Name="Person" c4Type="Person" c4Description="Description of person." label="<font style="font-size: 16px"><b>%c4Name%</b></font><div>[%c4Type%]</div><br><div><font style="font-size: 11px"><font c4Description="Public web client for external uses to get access to specific protected backend systems" label="<font style="font-size: 16px"><b>%c4Name%</b></font><div>[%c4Type%]</div><br><div><font style="font-size: 11px"><font color="#cccccc">%c4Description%</font></div>" id="R8XqHCfYHKCGaH8J9iBB-8"> <mxCell style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=#8C8496;fontColor=#ffffff;align=center;arcSize=10;strokeColor=#736782;metaEdit=1;resizable=0;points=[[0.25,0,0],[0.5,0,0],[0.75,0,0],[1,0.25,0],[1,0.5,0],[1,0.75,0],[0.75,1,0],[0.5,1,0],[0.25,1,0],[0,0.75,0],[0,0.5,0],[0,0.25,0]];"
